channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 20:32 Air alert in Dnipropetrovsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 20:32 Air alert in Dnipropetrovsk region. Follow further messages. #Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 20:02 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.

item.title: 游리 7:53 p.m. Alarm response in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Manganets and Manganetsk Territorial Community - Myrivsk Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivsk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 7:53 p.m. Alarm response in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m.
